data.title: Arcadia (De Baker) Bandini, a portrait
data.meta_description: formerly Arcadia Bandini, also Arcadia Stearns.Portrait of Arcadia (De Baker) Bandini. Don~a Arcadia was born in San Diego during the '20's. Her father was Don Juan Lorenzo Bruno Bandini, her mother Don~a Dolores Estudillo. She married Don Abel Stearns at San Gabriel Mission when she was about sixteen, and some time after this death in 1871 she married Col. R. S. Baker.
